web_snippets: Scott is also a published writer, having released his autobiography, Adventures of a Waterboy, in 2012. Mike Scott. Scott performing with the Waterboys in 2019.
Mike Scott ... is a Scottish singer, songwriter and musician. He is the founding member, lead singer, guitarist and songwriter of rock band The Waterboys.
